frontend.menu.project.one.kichwa.section: Kichwa is present throughout the Ecuadorian territory, being the largest existing ancestral nationality, even reaching the Galapagos Islands.

The Kichwa inhabitants traversed mountains, rivers, and volcanoes across the territory to establish their culture and language. This is why there are dialectal varieties, although a large part of their descendants are forgetting their verbal roots.
The Kichwa-speaking population is approximately 724,721 people, but it is estimated that there are actually more than a million Kichwas willing to rescue their culture.
The Kichwa language is spoken in the 7 countries belonging to the Tawa-Inti-Suyu: Southern Colombia, Ecuador, Peru, Bolivia, eastern region of Brazil, northern Argentina, and northern Chile.
frontend.menu.project.one.elements.secti: There are certain sounds that characterize a language, and correct pronunciation is important. The study of these sounds and their combination rules is known as
The words we use are formed by smaller elements that, when combined, serve to form them. The part of grammar that studies this phenomenon is called
We speak with words, but those words need to be organized according to certain rules. The part of grammar that deals with the rules governing sentence structure is called
is the way in which words are combined and changed to form sentences and express different meanings. These words include the subject, complement, and verb, along with agglutinative particles.
The Chaski Shimi: Messenger of the Language

frontend.menu.home.testimonials.users.on: The design perfectly matches what we were looking for. An attractive and clean visual in a functional, comfortable, and intuitive layout. All with personalized attention, thanks to which our office’s needs were understood.
frontend.menu.home.testimonials.users.tw: Creative professionals who captured exactly what we wanted to achieve. Intuitive, because with the idea we shared, they knew how to expand and translate it into a great result. They talk a little, but listen a lot. We’re happy with Distintiva, whom we see as true professionals.
frontend.menu.home.testimonials.users.th: The distinctive quality of Meet Clic is their proactive contribution to the project. They don't just rely on standard templates. They advise, develop... and it works! The result exceeded expectations.
frontend.menu.home.testimonials.users.fo: For me, Distintiva is a company with qualities that make it unique and indispensable. In programming, design, and communication, they stand out for professionalism and creativity. But most of all, I’d highlight their closeness and involvement with clients, treating your problems as their own, and delivering great results.

frontend.menu.home.how-it-works.business: Join our community and register relevant information about your business for future customers.
In our platform, manage your business info, products and services. Post promotions, discounts, and activities.
By interacting with your customers’ needs and concerns, your service will improve.
frontend.menu.home.how-it-works.customer: Explore interesting businesses in our community, check their products and services, and connect directly with trusted ones rated by other users.
Join activities posted by businesses such as sharing, referring their services/products, promotions and discounts.
By engaging in company activities, you can receive rewards (Yapitas) you can use on the platform.

page.aboutUs.variants.vision.title: Our Vision
page.aboutUs.variants.vision.description: To be facilitators in the process of foreign trade of products and services, becoming the strategic ally of startups, small and medium industries. Optimizing all logistical and commercial aspects related to the operation.
page.aboutUs.variants.mission.title: Our Mission
page.aboutUs.variants.mission.descriptio: To be the preferred partner in the commercialization and application of Foreign Trade, contributing to the economic improvement of our clients. Adding value to the companies we represent, maintaining an active presence in the international market. Promoting a collaborative culture among our team, clients, and providers, generating ideas, decisions, and practical utilities in management.
page.aboutUs.variants.aboutData.title: About Us
page.aboutUs.variants.aboutData.columnOn: Mundicomex officially started in 2018 as a logistics and transportation service. It gained trust among international clients thanks to its response times and quality service. With over 30 years of experience with airlines, shipping companies, and freight agencies, we offer the best alternatives for tracking cargo from origin to destination, including customs and local transport services nationally and internationally.
page.aboutUs.variants.aboutData.columnTw: In 2022, we saw the need to innovate and launch new business lines: MundiBox, MundiFlowers, MundiProducts, MundiFruits. With the opening of Mundicomex USA LLC in Arizona, we have built partnerships in the United States and worldwide. We aim to develop active international trade through our business lines, alliances, and customer loyalty.
page.aboutUs.variants.aboutTem.title: Our Team
page.aboutUs.variants.aboutTem.descripti: Meet our professionals and business consultants
